property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Vanishing 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.) When Aven Riftwatcher enters or leaves the battlefield, you gain 2 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player chooses a number of lands they control equal to the number of lands controlled by the player who controls the fewest, then sacrifices the rest. Players discard cards and sacrifice creatures the same way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike Ballynock Cohort gets +1/+1 as long as you control another white creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A kithkin's worst enemy is solitude.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Benevolent Bodyguard: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My destiny is to save others so their destinies may be achieved."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Vanishing 4 (This creature enters the battlefield with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: While an opponent is choosing targets as part of casting a spell they control or activating an ability they control, that player must choose at least one Flagbearer on the battlefield if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Giving little thought to their own defense, they carried the flag that united their army.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{W}: Target permanent you control gains protection from white until end of turn. {1}: Target spell or permanent becomes white until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Virtue is an inner light that can prevail in every soul."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The vanguard is skilled at waging war alone. The enemy is often defeated before its reinforcements reach the front.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for an artifact or enchantment card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Organization is often undervalued but rarely unjustified." - Frasio, royal archivist

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant permanent When Faith's Fetters enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life. Enchanted permanent can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a nontoken creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance When Glimmerpoint Stag enters the battlefield, exile another target permanent. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 2 life for each Shrine you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To the sorrow of all, its fire was turned toward those who worshipped it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, target creature loses all abilities and has base power and toughness 0/1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Through failure we learn our finest lessons in humility.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creature tokens you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In life, they were a motley crew: farmers, lords, cutpurses, priests. In death, they are united in singular, benevolent purpose.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Jareth, Leonine Titan blocks, it gets +7/+7 until end of turn. {W}: Jareth gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Light's champion in the stronghold of darkness.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, protection from black Echo {3}{W}{W} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Karmic Guide enters the battlefield, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Kor Hookmaster enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For us, a rope represents the ties that bind the kor. For you, it's more literal."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Scholars seek to understand the way the world is. I wish to shape the world into what it should be."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some sky steeds break from the thundering herd to ride free on the open winds.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Monk Idealist enters the battlefield, return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She will not touch a weapon, yet she is the greatest protector her people have ever known.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the first time in his life, Grakk felt a little warm and fuzzy inside.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like blinking or breathing, responding to an alarm is an involuntary reflex.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn. Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you must go out at night, bring a mob." - Master of the Elgaud Cathars

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Seal of Cleansing: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Find the dens of evil and flood them with light." - Hulo, the Penitent Wanderer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target attacking creature. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It suddenly dawned on Jorin that farming was quite a noble profession.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Follow the light. In its absence, follow her.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Good strategists seize opportunities. Great strategists make their own.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever a creature with flying dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Soulcatcher.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Their spirits walk the winds and fill my soul."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Squadron Hawk enters the battlefield, you may search your library for up to three cards named Squadron Hawk, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The smallest seed of regret can bloom into redemption.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target nonland permanent into its owner's library just beneath the top X cards of that library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once you've been dragged down the currents of time, you'll never quite trust your own permanence again.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender When Wall of Omens enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I search for a vision of Zendikar that does not include the Eldrazi." - Expedition journal entry

property.name: Rules
property.value: When War Priest of Thune enters the battlefield, you may destroy target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let nothing take away from the purity of swords clashing or of arrows taking flight toward the breast of evil."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Welkin Guide enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those talons really dig into your skin, but it's better than being dropped." - Rafiq of the Many

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash When Whitemane Lion enters the battlefield, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Saltfield nomads call a sudden storm a "whitemane."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Draw three cards. {2}{U}{U}: Return Arcanis the Omnipotent to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He has journeyed where none have been before. Now he returns to ensure that none follow.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mizzium-sphere array drove her mind deep into the thought field, where only the rarest motes of genius may be plucked.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Cephalid Sage has "When Cephalid Sage enters the battlefield, draw three cards, then discard two cards."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you don't have the best toys, find the one who does.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may return an Island you control to its owner's hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player draws two cards. Flashback - {1}{U}, Pay 3 life. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No fact escapes me. Why do you think you can?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library. You exile the top ten cards of your library. Then each player draws up to seven cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player mills three cards. Flashback {1}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may pay 1 life and exile a blue card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Counter target spell.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play with the top card of your library revealed. You may play lands and cast spells from the top of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Is the inevitable any less miraculous?" - Veldka, wandering sage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's hard to hurt anyone when you're as transparent as your motives." - Ertai, wizard adept

property.name: Rules
property.value: Giant Tortoise gets +0/+3 as long as it's untapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the coastal states of Jhess and Valeron, "tortoise" is a synonym for "stubborn."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is no confusion as to the boundary of the archmage's territory." - Ippin, master cartographer

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card for each Shrine you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To the sorrow of all, its winds found sin in the hearts of those who once learned from its wisdom.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Counter target spell if it's red. • Destroy target permanent if it's red.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fire can be savage, but it is fickle. Water is always true, its flow steady and world-shaping.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.) Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Into its maw went the seventh sea, never to be seen again while the world remains." - Esper fable

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+2]: Look at the top card of target player's library. You may put that card on the bottom of that player's library. [0]: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order. −1: Return target creature to its owner's hand. −12: Exile all cards from target player's library, then that player shuffles their hand into their library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Jetting Glasskite becomes the target of a spell or ability for the first time each turn, counter that spell or ability.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The bolt struck with a flash, and there was a terrible sound, as of glass shattering, but the creature was unharmed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Man-o'-War enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Beauty to the eye does not always translate to the touch." - Naimah, Femeref philosopher

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on top of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What a lonely agony, the memory of memories lost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Merfolk don't always know what they're looking for, but they're certain once they find it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for an instant or sorcery card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The student searches the world for meaning. The master finds worlds of meaning in the search.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player draws a card. Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Oona grants her favored subjects a dream from her own guarded heart.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Peregrine Drake enters the battlefield, untap up to five lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Always a welcome sight breaking through the clouds." - Talrand, sky summoner

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Is it an amalgamation of faded memories or the projection of a half-remembered dream? Neither answer offers any comfort.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Imprint - When Phyrexian Ingester enters the battlefield, you may exile target nontoken creature. Phyrexian Ingester gets +X/+Y, where X is the exiled creature card's power and Y is its toughness.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Prodigal Sorcerer deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You can't learn to enjoy life's amusements in the pages of books. You must seek them out in earnest."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search target player's library for up to three cards with flashback and put them into that player's graveyard. Then the player shuffles.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The best foresight is hindsight." - Empress Llawan

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Screeching Skaab enters the battlefield, mill two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its screeching is the sound of you losing your mind.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, Serendib Efreet deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Summoners of efreeti remember only the power of command, never the sting of regret.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Islandcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for an Island card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Flashback {4}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The same magic that lets geists pass through our realm can force them out of it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Other creatures you control with flying get +0/+1. {T}: Other creatures you control with flying get +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "By thorn and by stone, we will fight to see the day when beauty returns to this world."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Stupefying Touch enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted creature's activated abilities can't be activated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A warrior without wit is simply meat."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create a 5/5 blue Wall creature token with defender. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The floor of the sea is paved with the shattered remnants of vessels that navigated its surface unwelcomed." - Thassa, god of the sea

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Creature spells with flying you cast cost {1} less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On Evos Isle, the swift and formidable aven enforce the will of the ruling sphinxes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying As long as Wonder is in your graveyard and you control an Island, creatures you control have flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The awestruck birds gazed at Wonder. Slowly, timidly, they rose into the air." - Scroll of Beginnings

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature card in a graveyard When Animate Dead enters the battlefield, if it's on the battlefield, it loses "enchant creature card in a graveyard" and gains "enchant creature put onto the battlefield with Animate Dead." Return enchanted creature card to the battlefield under your control and attach Animate Dead to it. When Animate Dead leaves the battlefield, that creature's controller sacrifices it. Enchanted creature gets -1/-0.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Whatever Yawgmoth marks, dies. There is no escape." - Tsabo Tavoc, Phyrexian general

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "See the beauty in death: the clean white bones lying in the fertile soil and the brightly colored moonglove sprouting from the fell earth."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Blood Artist or another creature dies, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Great art can never be created without great suffering."

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices an artifact, creature, or land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Home is where you can find a decent graveyard and strangers can disappear without awkward questions."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a nonland card name. Target player reveals their hand and discards all cards with that name. Flashback - Sacrifice a creature. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Carrion Feeder can't block. Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Carrion Feeder.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Stinking of rot, it leaps between gravestones in search of its next meal.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Deadbridge Shaman dies, target opponent discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ending her life won't end the infestation.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't worry. I'm not going to deprive you of all your secrets. Just your most precious one." - Liliana Vess

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a card, put that card into your graveyard, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'll return once you've ripened." - Ghoulcaller Gisa

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those without beauty are Lorwyn's greatest tumor. The winnowers have an unpleasant duty, but a necessary one." - Eidren, perfect of Lys Alana

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A full coffin is like a full coffer - both are attractive to thieves.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Havoc Demon dies, all creatures get -5/-5 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A cry of pain as it enters this world. A chorus of screams as it leaves.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, target opponent discards a card for each Shrine you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To the sorrow of all, its dark reach grasped and crushed those who guarded its silent vigil.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player discards two cards at random.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The priests plead for your anguish and pray for your despair.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Ichorid. At the beginning of your upkeep, if Ichorid is in your graveyard, you may exile a black creature card other than Ichorid from your graveyard. If you do, return Ichorid to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Zombies mourn for the living and celebrate those who will soon be given the gift of death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Discard an Elf card: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of Elves you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In beauty-obsessed Lys Alana, one cut of her blade means the difference between a high society feast and raking through the dungheap for scraps.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Morbid - When you cast this spell, if a creature died this turn, you may copy Malicious Affliction and may choose a new target for the copy. Destroy target nonblack creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Such an affliction appears to seek out the pure." - Byro, plague doctor

property.name: Rules
property.value: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Skip your draw step. Whenever you discard a card, exile that card from your graveyard. Pay 1 life: Exile the top card of your library face down. Put that card into your hand at the beginning of your next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike When Nekrataal enters the battlefield, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. That creature can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His victims don't have time to feel despair.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You draw two cards and you lose 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have seen things that would reduce a weaker person to blubbering and raving. Want to hear about them?" - Vraska

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Phyrexian Gargantua enters the battlefield, you draw two cards and you lose 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Other Phyrexians have nightmares about the gargantua.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Phyrexian Rager enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I believe many worlds will bow to Phyrexia. Mirrodin is merely the first." - Sheoldred, Whispering One

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}, {T}, Discard a card: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Prowling Pangolin enters the battlefield, any player may sacrifice two creatures. If a player does, sacrifice Prowling Pangolin.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Sengir Autocrat enters the battlefield, create three 0/1 black Serf creature tokens. When Sengir Autocrat leaves the battlefield, exile all Serf tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The penalty for idleness is death. The penalty for disputing the penalty is death."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: High walls, a sturdy keep, a strong garrison . . . they made no difference. In a matter of moments, the city was lost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Skulking Ghost becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They exist only so long as the living take no notice." - Kifimbo, Shadow guildmage

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay X life. All creatures get -X/-X until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's a difficult task to quarantine a plague that moves with the clouds." - Esara, healer adept

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Morbid - That creature gets -13/-13 until end of turn instead if a creature died this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Linger on death's door and risk being invited in.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}: Regenerate Twisted Abomination. (The next time this creature would be destroyed, instead tap it, remove it from combat, and heal all damage on it.) Swampcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Swamp card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In Urborg, few things are less permanent than death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a card, then shuffle and put that card on top. You lose 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: True power is achieved through blood and sweat. But mostly blood.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose two target creature cards in your graveyard. Sacrifice a creature. If you do, return the chosen cards to the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Die. But die knowing that your pathetic life will yield a great bounty for me." - Zul Ashur, lich lord

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {T}: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {1}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate Wake of Vultures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "So the vulture said to the griffin, ‘You gonna eat that?'" - Azeworai, "The Ugly Bird"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Morbid - When Wakedancer enters the battlefield, if a creature died this turn, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hers is an ancient form of necromancy, steeped in shamanic trance and ritual that few skaberen or ghoulcallers comprehend.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste When Avarax enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a card named Avarax, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. {1}{R}: Avarax gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Battle Squadron's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The goblins made an unruly pile with military precision.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Beetleback Chief enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Whether trained, ridden, or eaten, few goblin military innovations have rivaled the bug.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Borderland Marauder attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though she is rightly feared, there are relatively few tales of her deeds in battle, for few survive her raids.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a spell from your graveyard, Burning Vengeance deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mist is the geists' sorrow. Wind is their pain. Fire is their vengeance.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Carbonize deals 3 damage to any target. If it's a creature, it can't be regenerated this turn, and if it would die this turn, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's no coming back from that." - Jaya Ballard

property.name: Rules
property.value: Chain Lightning deals 3 damage to any target. Then that player or that permanent's controller may pay {R}{R}. If the player does, they may copy this spell and may choose a new target for that copy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Echo {4}{R}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Crater Hellion enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to each other creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw two cards, then discard a card at random. Flashback {2}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her mind was quite gone, yet she spoke nothing but truth.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender When Dragon Egg dies, create a 2/2 red Dragon creature token with flying and "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dragon birth lairs are littered with treasure to entice the young from their eggs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash When Dualcaster Mage enters the battlefield, copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It has been my experience that disasters like to strike in pairs."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw two cards, then discard two cards. Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Avacyn has abandoned us! We have nothing left except what we can take!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste When Fervent Cathar enters the battlefield, target creature can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'll put my sword down only to die. And I don't plan on doing that today."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Firebolt deals 2 damage to any target. Flashback {4}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flame Jab deals 1 damage to any target. Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fire's out. Should be safe now." - Gnarltrunk

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, discard a card at random, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Echo {2}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Ghitu Slinger enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, Honden of Infinite Rage deals damage to any target equal to the number of Shrines you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To the sorrow of all, its rage became focused on those who once stoked it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Echo {2}{R}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Keldon Champion enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vanishing 2 (This creature enters the battlefield with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.) When Keldon Marauders enters or leaves the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kird Ape gets +1/+2 as long as you control a Forest.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Mogg Fanatic: It deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I got it! I got it! I - "

property.name: Rules
property.value: Echo {1}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Mogg War Marshal enters the battlefield or dies, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The orcs' banner sends a clear message: "Stand against us and meet the same fate as the goblins."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Price of Progress deals damage to each player equal to twice the number of nonbasic lands that player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Enthusiasm can be tempered in the furnace of the earth.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Counter target spell if it's blue. • Destroy target permanent if it's blue.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Water can be crushing, but it is predictable. Fire is always dynamic, its rage absolute and all-consuming.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may exile a red card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Pyrokinesis deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains haste until end of turn. Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In an attempt to restore pride to Shiv and to forge an undying legacy, Rorix traveled far to compete for glory in Otaria's Grand Coliseum.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures without flying can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is not in me to tread lightly." - Ryda, geomancer

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Siege-Gang Commander enters the battlefield, create three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens. {1}{R}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Siege-Gang Commander deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Sacrifice the creature at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Echo {3}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Stingscourger enters the battlefield, return target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Sulfuric Vortex deals 2 damage to that player. If a player would gain life, that player gains no life instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice two creatures: Create a 3/1 red Beast creature token named Carnivore.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't spend long examining signs of its passage. That you find them at all means it's still close at hand." - Varra, Warden of the East Road

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and can't block. When Undying Rage is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Undying Rage to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protection from white {1}{R}: Wildfire Emissary gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The efreet is a striding storm with a voice that crackles like fire." - Qhattib, vizier of Amiqat

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, trample When Worldgorger Dragon enters the battlefield, exile all other permanents you control. When Worldgorger Dragon leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to the battlefield under their owners' control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 1/1 red Elemental creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Immolation is the sincerest form of flattery.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land When Abundant Growth enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted land has "{T}: Add one mana of any color."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 for each other enchantment on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I pass to you all we have ever been. Go forth and become all we never could."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample As long as Brawn is in your graveyard and you control a Forest, creatures you control have trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "‘I have arrived,' bellowed Brawn, and the plane shuddered." - Scroll of Beginnings

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Centaur Chieftain has "When Centaur Chieftain enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Civic Wayfinder enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These alleys are not safe. Come, I can guide you back to the market square."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature or enchantment card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the first time in many years, Elspeth asked for help.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3. When enchanted creature dies, create a 3/3 green Elephant creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another Elf enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Elvish Vanguard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our lives are woven together like the trees' branches over our heads, forming a canopy that protects us all."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you control no other creatures, sacrifice Emperor Crocodile.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The king of Yavimaya's waters pays constant attention to his subjects . . . and thrives on their adulation.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flinthoof Boar gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Mountain. {R}: Flinthoof Boar gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Through the smoke and flames it hunts, sniffing out the panicked and confused.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I fear no army or beast, but only the morning fog. Our assault can survive everything else." - Lord Hilneth

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player shuffles up to three target cards from their graveyard into their library. Draw a card. When Gaea's Blessing is put into your graveyard from your library, shuffle your graveyard into your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a green creature card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Shuffle Green Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the green sun crowned, Phyrexian prophecies glowed on the Tree of Tales.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Words lie. People lie. The land tells the truth."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap three untapped Elves you control: Add {G}{G}{G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Study the great spirits of our age and those of the past. Prune secrets from the branching traceries of our lineage." - Twila, Gilt-Leaf archdruid

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token for each Shrine you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To the sorrow of all, its web became a net that strangled those who helped weave it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Elves you control get +1/+1. {G}, {T}: Create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In a culture of beauty, the most beautiful are worshipped as gods.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you control a Forest, rather than pay this spell's mana cost, you may have an opponent gain 3 life. Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One bone broken for every twig snapped underfoot. - Llanowar penalty for trespassing

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an Elf spell, you may create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From the highest tiers of Dawn's Light Palace to the deepest shade of Wren's Run, the silver notes of the horn shimmer through the air, and all who hear it feel its pull.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a green creature. Search your library for a green creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: . . . but the price of Mangara's freedom was Asmira's life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Its controller gains 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The timeless, tireless jaws of nature shall one day devour us all." - Sildark, artificer of Omu

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Threshold - Nimble Mongoose gets +2/+2 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One thread connected all the travelers' stories: the ferocity of the mongoose.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has trample. When Rancor is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Rancor to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Regal Force enters the battlefield, draw a card for each green creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It rarely moves, standing stock still in its clearing. When it does stir, ravens stop their cawing and crickets their chirping. All of nature watches in awed silence.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create a 6/6 green Wurm creature token. Flashback {3}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Seal of Strength: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your first reaction may be to stand very still and hope she didn't see you. Trust me, she did." - Endril, Kalonian naturalist

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He was born of the Mirari, thrust out of his homeland before he was even aware. Left without purpose or meaning, he found both in the pits.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your draw step, you may draw two additional cards. If you do, choose two cards in your hand drawn this turn. For each of those cards, pay 4 life or put the card on top of your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn. Flashback {2}{G}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Their arrows are tipped with basilisk eyes and fletched with cockatrice feathers.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of Elves on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you ever want to leave this forest, now's the time."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {G}. Threshold - Werebear gets +3/+3 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return an Elf you control to its owner's hand: Untap target creature. Activate only once each turn.

property.value: "Let the wild in. Channel its strength." - Freyalise

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Xantid Swarm attacks, defending player can't cast spells this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When they land on you, all you can think about is tearing them off.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Yavimaya Enchantress gets +1/+1 for each enchantment on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her roots connect her to the forest's wishes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample. Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, deathtouch When Baleful Strix enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its beak rends flesh and bone, exposing the tender marrow of dream.

property.value: Haste Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom in a random order.)

property.value: Flying Whenever Brago, King Eternal deals combat damage to a player, exile any number of target nonland permanents you control, then return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Target player draws two cards, then discards two cards. −2: Gain control of target artifact. −6: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast a spell that targets one or more permanents, gain control of those permanents."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player mills two cards. Then you put a creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you want to wreak havoc above, sometimes it's best to look below.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Flame-Kin Zealot enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Boros soldiers are like a cache of bombs ready to explode, and the flame-kin light their fuses.

property.value: Tap an untapped creature you control: Tap target artifact or creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The righteous light of Selesnya is channeled through the devout, striking out to blind the nonbelievers.

property.value: "Even if we dislodge them, I fear these lands will never again yield crops." - Kimmick, vanguard knight

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control have haste. Cascade, cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom in a random order. Then do it again.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Shaman of the Pack enters the battlefield, target opponent loses life equal to the number of Elves you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To the elves, her spear is a compass; to the boggarts, a harbinger of doom.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom in a random order.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, first strike, vigilance, lifelink, protection from red and from green

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No one has properly answered her favorite riddle: "Why should I spare your life?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Flying Other creatures you control with flying get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Thunder doesn't always mean rain. Sometimes it means ruin.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Trygon Predator deals combat damage to a player, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment that player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Held aloft by metabolized magic, trygons are ravenous for sources of mystic fuel.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have seen entire civilizations rise and fall. You mortals are but dust to me." - Sorin Markov

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a number. Destroy all artifacts and creatures with mana value equal to that number. Then target player reveals their hand and discards all nonland cards with mana value equal to the number.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Wee Dragonauts gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The blazekite is a simple concept, really - just a vehicular application of dragscoop ionics and electropropulsion magnetronics." - Juzba, Izzet tinker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, creatures you control get +1/+1 and creatures your opponents control get -1/-1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Jharic returned from Grixis changed, a haunted look in her eyes. She destroyed them with an unholy glee that made me shudder." - Knight-Captain Wyhorn

property.value: Create a 5/5 blue and red Elemental creature token with flying. Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It hears and answers every orison across Shadowmoor.

property.value: {T}: Exile target land card from a graveyard. Add one mana of any color. {B}, {T}: Exile target instant or sorcery card from a graveyard. Each opponent loses 2 life. {G}, {T}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. You gain 2 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({RG} can be paid with either {R} or {G}.) Trample; haste; shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you'd ever met one, you wouldn't ask me to justify the extra provisions for additional security." - Lorref, caravan master

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield if {B} was spent to cast this spell. Creatures target player controls get +2/+0 and gain haste until end of turn if {R} was spent to cast this spell. (Do both if {B}{R} was spent.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you work at sawing up carcasses, you notice how the joints fit, how the nerves are arrayed, and how the skin peels back." - Ashnod, to Tawnos

property.name: Rules
property.value: Imprint - When Chrome Mox enters the battlefield, you may exile a nonartifact, nonland card from your hand. {T}: Add one mana of any of the exiled card's colors.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Imprint - When Duplicant enters the battlefield, you may exile target nontoken creature. As long as a card exiled with Duplicant is a creature card, Duplicant has the power, toughness, and creature types of the last creature card exiled with Duplicant. It's still a Shapeshifter.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {5}, {T}: Draw two cards, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is like life and destiny: we think we know the story, but we have read only half the tale.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}, {T}: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a land card. Goblin Charbelcher deals damage equal to the number of nonland cards revealed this way to any target. If the revealed land card was a Mountain, Goblin Charbelcher deals double that damage instead. Put the revealed cards on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Imprint - When Isochron Scepter enters the battlefield, you may exile an instant card with mana value 2 or less from your hand. {2}, {T}: You may copy the exiled card. If you do, you may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Juggernaut attacks each combat if able. Juggernaut can't be blocked by Walls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many a besieged city has surrendered upon hearing the distinctive rumble of the juggernaut.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Mana Crypt deals 3 damage to you. {T}: Add {C}{C}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Mill a card: Add {C}. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The toymaker frowned in bewilderment. None of his creations had ever sneezed before.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mindless Automaton enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. {1}, Discard a card: Put a +1/+1 counter on Mindless Automaton. Remove two +1/+1 counters from Mindless Automaton: Draw a card.

property.value: The kor send their thopter kites to see if the land is in a welcoming mood.

property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It bends not light but mana, aligning its chaotic currents into the sharp angles necessary for the mystic's purposes.

property.value: Elves believe the hydra-god Progenitus sleeps beneath Naya, feeding on forgotten magics.
